text: Connect with your loved ones and providers using myDiya's sharing and telehealth capabilities.
You may be caring for another family member or friend, and want quick access to their health information. You can easily create a myDiya health diary for someone else.
Providers and caregivers can collaborate using the same health diary, so you know everything that is going on with your or your love one's care.
Control who sees your data and how much access they have. You can choose from read-only or edit access options.
